#!/bin/bash
LOG_FILE="/var/log/nginx/access.log"

echo "Top 10 IP addresses:"
awk '{print $1}' "$LOG_FILE" | sort | uniq -c | sort -rn | head -10

echo ""
echo "404 errors:"
grep " 404 " "$LOG_FILE" | wc -l

echo ""
echo "Requests per hour:"
awk '{print $4}' "$LOG_FILE" | cut -d: -f2 | sort | uniq -c
